I know, I remember but I didn't fully understand how exactly you were going=
 to use it.

So those clips came from this trumpet?
  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: SnowfireL@... 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: =
Wednesday, May 20, 2009 6:01 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Here's a few I did=
n't put them in file,


  I tried to tell you all before, I have an old spi=
rit trumpet, it's kind of beat up, but years ago, when I went to a Christia=
n/Spiritualist Church the Rev. she was about 86 year's old then, she used t=
o have one of those things fly all over the place, and spirit could create =
these ectoplasm  vocal cords in it, and talk independently, I know seems un=
real, and grant, there are fakers out there, but Rev. Lee was real.  As far=
 as how they did this, spirit this is, I have no clue, I only know they cou=
ld, it's made out of light weight metal probably not even an ounce, mine is=
 pretty banged up.  I can take a picture of it if you like and post it,  la=
st night I did a silly thing, and put my little RS 125 inside it while it's=
 standing up, and stuck the mic inside it, and just talked, I got some loud=
 and clear voices on the PC, I don't have a recorder, I just use the PC her=
e in the room, I'm going to try this again tonight, hopefully I can get the=
m to talk more, it's hard though because I'm going to need to use the mic t=
oo when I ask them something, then carefully slip it back inside, if you ev=
er get a trumpet, never allow anyone to put their mouth on it's end, I don'=
t know why that is, it's just what I was told, I guess that is a big spirit=
ual No, No.
  Ok, I got  a picture of it here, as you can see it's pretty b=
anged up they are easy to make, but there is no guarantee it will fly for e=
veryone hehe.sf




  In a message dated 5/20/2009 7:14:23 P.M. Eastern Day=
light Time, april@... writes:



    =EF=BB=BF 

 =
   What do you mean by using the trumpet? How did you do that?

      -----=
 Original Message ----- 
      From: SnowfireL@... 
      To: EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups.com ; RTSC@yahoogroups.com ; inside_the_box_rtsc_talk_radio@yaho=
ogroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 5:10 PM
      Subject: [EV=
P-ITC] Here's a few I didn't put them in file, [2 Attachments]



      I'v=
e been removing them as I go, but here is some more of what I got last nigh=
t using trumpet, they gave me one with all sorts of people's name on it, I =
don't know any of them really.  I did get lots of young people, and childre=
n too<g>sf

ell's full line of laptops.
